title: Google\Cloud\Language\V1\ClassificationModelOptions
name: ClassificationModelOptions
description:
Model options available for classification requests.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.language.v1.ClassificationModelOptions

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.v1_model
params.description: Setting this field will use the V1 model and V1 content categories version. The V1 model is a legacy model; support for this will be discontinued in the future.

params.name: data.v2_model
params.description: Setting this field will use the V2 model with the appropriate content categories version. The V2 model is a better performing model.
